actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to exempt certain facilities from the 3-year transition period under the prospective payment system for skilled nursing facilities.
short_title: Skilled Nursing Facility Payment Fairness Act of 1998

summary.text: Skilled Nursing Facility Payment Fairness Act of 1998 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to authorize certain facilities to exempt themselves from the three-year transition period under the prospective payment system for skilled nursing facilities. Limits such optional exemption to facilities that: (1) are providing services whose level and type are substantially different from the level and type of services the facility provided in FY 1995; or (2) were eligible for and elected to receive payments pursuant to the post-June 30, 1998, prospective payment system for the cost reporting period immediately preceding the facility's first cost reporting period beginning on or after July 1, 1998.

titles.title: Skilled Nursing Facility Payment Fairness Act of 1998
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to exempt certain facilities from the 3-year transition period under the prospective payment system for skilled nursing facilities.
